game.name: Pet Simulator 99
game.creator: BIG Games
game.description: Pet Simulator 99 is a pet-collecting simulator where players hatch eggs, collect powerful pets, earn coins and gems, and progress through worlds using upgraded pets and new mechanics.

mechanics.pet_collection: Players hatch eggs to collect pets with different rarities and strengths.
mechanics.pet_upgrades: Pets can be upgraded to increase damage and efficiency.
mechanics.enchantments: Pets can be enchanted to boost coins, damage, gems, or special effects.
mechanics.area_progression: New areas unlock as players earn more currency and improve pet power.
mechanics.trading: Players can trade pets, items, and currency with other players.

tips: Upgrade pet slots early for faster progression.
Use enchantments that boost coins and gems.
Save gems for better eggs or upgrades.
rules: Scamming or fake trades are not allowed.
